name: Apophis (Ludum Dare 38)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 38, theme 'small world'.

Use thrusters to redirect the course of an asteroid before it collides with the earth.

Left Mouse Button : Place thruster / cancel thrust
Right Mouse Button : Rotate the camera

Code/Design/Art: @DesignerBradley
Music: @MattMakesThings
